messages.subject: Someone please,
messages.msgSnippet: give me a kick in the butt to get me off of this computer and get me moving towards the housework and what else I have to get done today? I have been sitting
messages.messageBody:
give me a kick in the butt to get me off of this computer and get me moving
towards the housework and what else I have to get done today?

I have been sitting on my butt now for 2 hours and nothing has gotten done
around here :o)

hehehehe

Jessi
